Summary Note:
The RM first met Greta Kristin Scholz at a wine tasting event in Berlin. They discovered a shared passion for fine wines and decided to explore potential business ventures together.
Having worked for over 34 years, Greta Kristin Scholz brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in her decision to join.
Family Background: Greta Kristin Scholz and Maier tied the knot in 1993. Together they have 2 kids called Jacqueline and Sofia.
Education Background:
Greta received her secondary school diploma from Helmut-Schmidt-Gymnasium Hamburg in 1986.
Greta completed her university education at University of Heidelberg in 1990.
She pursued addtionally further eduaction by attending Heidelberg University of Education and graduating in 1995.
Occupation History:
Greta Kristin Scholz is a 57 year old and comes from Germany.
Greta Kristin Scholz launched her career as a Financial Advisor at Commerzbank Private Banking, where she gained valuable experience from 1991 to 1993.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Portfolio Manager at Deutsche Bank Private Wealth Management in 1995, further expanding her skill set.
At Deutsche Bank Private Wealth Management, she worked as a Wealth Manager from 1997 to 2000, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
In 2000, she transitioned to Commerzbank Private Banking to take on the position of Family Office Executive, capitalizing on her expertise to propel business growth.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 1740000 EUR.
Client does not have any properties.She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome her as a new client.
